author: Staff Reporter
text:
A five-year-old boy, M. Azeez of Ramavarmansirai village near Kalyakavilai, sustained grievous injuries while getting down from his school van on Thursday evening.

According to Palugal police, the boy was dragged to a distance by the van as his school bag got caught in the locked door. When the bag finally came out, his legs were caught under the wheels. Hearing the screams of the boy, the driver stopped the van. The boy was immediately taken to the nearby medical college at Karakonam in Kerala and later shifted to Thiruvananthapuram Government Hospital. The boy was studying in standard I at a government-aided primary school run by a Christian missionary in Melpalai.

The driver of the van, C. Nelson (55), was taken into custody by Palugal police.
title: School van drags boy to a distance
